page.title: 01A general summary
page.content: In the centre of this mainly agricultural area lie the villages of{ {PLAWSWORTH, NETTLESWORTH}and{ {KIMBLESWORTH.}Most of the larger settlement of{SACRISTON}lies about 2Km to the West. The A167(formerly the old A1) runs North to South through the area dividing{PLAWSWORTH}from{NETTLESWORTH {and{KIMBLESWORTH.} The main East coast railway line from London to Edinburgh also travels through this block. Historically the area was once deep in the heart of the County Durham coalfield but the pit closure of{ {KIMBLESWORTH}and the run-down of{ {SACRISTON}colliery have greatly reduced employment in the area.
